channel.title: Can not start chapter 1
channel.description: When I start a new game it doesnt start on the train i start in a map called #BMS_Chapter0_Title. The map doesnt do anything. and i cant start from the regular chapter

item.title: Can not start chapter 1
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Are you sure you installed it to the correct path? GameInfo.txt should be located in steam\steamapps\sourcemods\BMS.

Read full topic
